portfolio.title: EasyItPoint Landing Page
portfolio.description: Developed a landing page for an agency website using HTML, CSS and Swiper JS to create a responsive and user-friendly UI. Implemented dynamic functionality using Javascript and deployed through Github pages.

portfolio.title: Saj Crypto
portfolio.description: Developed a cryptocurrency website that shows information and news about cryptocurrencies using React JS and Material UI. Added functionality where users can mark their favorite currency and it will show on the favorite page. Implemented Redux toolkit and Redux Persist to manage and store states. Fetched data using RTK Query from CoinGecko and Bing news search API.

portfolio.title: Saj Estate
portfolio.description: Developed a property listing website using Next JS and Sass.  Stored data in Strapi headless CMS and deployed it through Heroku. Fetched the data using GraphQL and used the Context API to manage states. Created dynamic routes using getStaticPaths and static site generation using getStaticProps.

portfolio.title: Job Hunting
portfolio.description: Developed a website for job seekers using React JS, Bootstrap 5. Added dynamic routes using React Router. Built API using Node JS and Express JS. Stored Data in MongoDB

portfolio.title: Ecommerceo
portfolio.description: Developed an eCommerce website using Next JS and Sass. Stored data in Sanity headless CMS. Fetched the data using GROQ and used the Context API to manage states.
